    Answer: Educational Equality (pg. 208); Existence of universities; Total number of universities; Constitutional protection for academic freedom; Freedom to research and teach; Freedom of academic exchange and dissemination; Institutional autonomy; Campus integrity; Academics as critics; International legal commitment to academic freedom under ICESCR

2.  What are the data's coverage (i.e., for which countries and years do we have data?)

    Answer: Years: 1900-2022; Countries: total 202 countries (pp. 40-41)
